original_text:
“And it shall come to pass afterward,
    that I will pour out my Spirit on all flesh;
your sons and your daughters shall prophesy,
    your old men shall dream dreams,
    and your young men shall see visions.
korean_text: 그 후에 내가 내 영을 만민에게 부어 주리니 너희 자녀들이 장래 일을 말할 것이며 너희 늙은이는 꿈을 꾸며 너희 젊은이는 이상을 볼 것이며

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass afterward,
that I will pour out my Spirit on all flesh;
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 영을 모든 육체에 부으리니,

sentences.original_text: your sons and your daughters shall prophesy,
your old men shall dream dreams,
and your young men shall see visions.
